fields.name: Prestige Exceeds Defense
fields.description: Your city's wealth and prestige have attracted unwanted attention. Without adequate defenses, you risk becoming a target for raiders, bandits, and ambitious neighboring lords.

fields.name: Food Shortage
fields.description: Your population has grown beyond your ability to feed them. Without adequate food production, hunger spreads through the streets, leading to unrest and potential famine.

fields.name: Civil Unrest
fields.description: Discontent festers among your citizens. High unrest can lead to riots, property damage, and even rebellion if not addressed swiftly through improved living conditions or increased security.

fields.name: Plague Risk
fields.description: Disease spreads easily in densely populated areas lacking proper sanitation. A plague outbreak could devastate your population and bring your city to its knees.

fields.name: Bandit Activity
fields.description: Outlaws prey on isolated settlements and undefended trade routes. Your outlying districts and farms are vulnerable to raids without proper garrison presence.

fields.name: Economic Stagnation
fields.description: Your treasury struggles to support your growing population. Low coin generation threatens your ability to maintain buildings, pay for defenses, and respond to crises.

fields.name: Religious Discontent
fields.description: The faithful grow restless without adequate places of worship. The Church's displeasure could manifest in reduced tithes, loss of prestige, or even religious unrest.

fields.name: Fire Hazard
fields.description: Closely packed wooden buildings and open flames create perfect conditions for catastrophic fires. Without fire prevention measures, a single spark could consume entire districts.

fields.name: Noble Rivalry
fields.description: Powerful noble houses within your walls grow restless and ambitious. Without sufficient prestige to command their respect, they may challenge your authority or plot amongst themselves.

fields.name: Merchant Guild Pressure
fields.description: Your city's trade flourishes, but the Merchant Guild demands proper market facilities to handle the volume. Their discontent could lead to reduced trade efficiency or guild sanctions.
